patterns: What kinds of items do you have?

responses: We offer a variety of products including home decor, handmade pottery, and delicious homemade food.

responses: We accept Paypal, Mastercard, and cash on delivery.

patterns: When will I receive my order?

responses: Sure, here's one: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!

patterns: How can I sell my products on your platform?
Tell me about selling on your platform.
responses: To become a seller, simply click on the 'Become a Seller' button and follow the easy steps to register yourself. Once registered, you'll get access to a dynamic dashboard where you can start listing your products.
